result.title: Spoj problem lsort(dynamic programming)
result.content: I am trying to solve this on spoj. I have first precomputed the index for both the case(appending number to beginning and appending number to end). Then, I used top down approach to find the minimum value. It works on most test cases but gives wrong answer on spoj. I am not able to figure out the reason. Please help. My Soloution
